sense.gloss: to rise (of a building, mountain, etc.), to tower, to soar
to rise (steeply), to tower, to soar
to tower, to rise, to soar
to raise (usu. one's shoulders, with a jaunty, swaggering effect)

sdata.j: ふと、↑私↑↓わたし↓は、↑後↑↓うし↓ろから↑聞↑↓きこ↓えて↑来↑↓く↓る↑微↑↓かす↓かな↑跫音↑↓きょうおん↓に↑耳↑↓みみ↓を↑聳↑↓そびえ↓てたのです。
sdata.e: Suddenly, I raised my ears to the faint sound of footsteps coming from behind me.
